touchboard.isSensorTouched: Returns true if a specific touch sensor is currently touched. Otherwise false.
touchboard.isSensorTouched|param|sensor: Sensor, der abgefragt werden soll, z.B. Sensor.T0
touchboard.isTouched: Returns true if a specific touch sensor is currently touched. Otherwise false.
touchboard.isTouched|param|sensorIndex: Sensorindex, der abgefragt werden soll, z.B. 0
touchboard.onTouch: Tue etwas, wenn ein Sensor ber√ºhrt oder losgelassen wird.
touchboard.onTouch|param|handler: body code to run when event is raised
touchboard.onTouch|param|sensor: Sensor, der abgefragt werden soll, z.B. Sensor.T0
touchboard.touchSensor:
Returns the sensor index of the last touch event that was received.
It could be either a sensor touched or released event.
This block is intended to be used inside of touch event handlers.
touchboard.touchSensorIndex: Turns a TouchSensor into its index value.
